website_summaries.verdict: Excellent fit offers flexibility in the hands. Zipper makes taking these gloves on and off easier.
pros: Excellent quality of the materials used in the gloves
Uses a Thinsulate liner to ensure maximum comfort and warmth
Palm of the glove prevents slipping
Lightweight gloves perform well in multiple situations
cons: Sizes tend to run a little small
Gloves sometimes have an unpleasant odor

customer_reviews.title: These, are quite fancy!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted leather gloves like the ones we got in the Marines; all leather with a nice fleece-like lining. I loved those things! Saw the zipper and I was sold! At first I thought they were the pair I had ordered for my wife (they looked small and feminine) but I suddenly realized they were mine! They fit, well, like a glove very streamlined maybe a bit snug but I prefer that over bulky and they are fancy! If I was a secret agent, these would be my gloves as I push an Aston-Martin to the limit on the Bundesautobahn... They're fancy!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ruben G. Zuniga Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good, but small for size
customer_reviews.text: Well made, but they run small for size. I was warned about this, so I ordered them in XXL instead of my usual XL: but even so, I was barely able to get them over my hands (which are, admittedly, large). Once the base of the gloves was down to my wrist, the fit was fine, but any tighter and I wouldn't have been able to put them on at all. I suggest you order at least one size larger than you normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves, and can't say enough about Marino's customer service! Beautiful, soft leather, but when I received them they were the wrong style (button rather than classic) and didn't fit well (that was on me: I am an 8 1/2 which says "M" on their sizing chart, but they ALSO say they run small, so I should have ordered the "L"). Got the usual "form letter" email from Marino asking if I was satisfied; I responded by describing my disappointment with the style and size; and they sent me a replacement pair, size large and in the correct style! I couldn't be happier -- great gloves, terrific value, and outstanding customer service.
customer_reviews.author: DrAlto

customer_reviews.title: Fancy smancy but they perform as good as they look
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality, lightweight gloves that are great for urban pursuits, and they're touchscreen compatible. I believe that thin, insulated leather gloves are warmer than thicker knit or fleece gloves, even the windproof kind, and these do not disappoint. When you're just running errands or going for walks, these gloves are great. They give you better tactile sensation than knit or fleece gloves, too. These are very well stitched handsome. I normally take a small and these are definitely a size smaller. The mediums fit me perfectly. I could do without the fancy gift boxing, however.
customer_reviews.author: Ragged Clown

customer_reviews.title: Great Product For The Price
customer_reviews.text: I have bigger hands and the XXL barely fit me. The gloves slip on and off, and also have buttons which you don't need to use. Looks like real leather and thin wool lining (or a blend), although it's hard to believe for $20. The gloves are waterproof, and performed well in cold, rainy, windy conditions, hiking around for hours. The surface of the gloves look slightly tattered after 3 days of brutal weather and heavy use. They are not the warmest gloves or the best fitting, but they look just like the picture and perfom well considering how cheap they are. If the fit was a little better I'd give them five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Adnan Safadi

customer_reviews.title: Size is big problem
customer_reviews.text: There are myriad problems with these gloves. I am a large or X large. So I ordered XX large. Though that would be comfortable. Finding XX large is a problem. They seem to think putting a label of XX on the glove is enough. Truly they were not even large. I could not get four fingers in the glove. They may be real leather but it is so thin, one can almost see through it. Could not recommend any part of this purchase except the packaging. It was very nicely packed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for price and what they are made for
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves for price and what they are made for. Fit is good, not perfect but for their price you shouldn’t expect custom fit. Also remember the leather has to stretch with use so don’t get discouraged when you first get them and they are a bit rigid Also I saw some reviews complaining they don’t keep you warm. These gloves are not meant for sub-zero temps. They have a thin lining which makes them look sleek and not bulky. They are perfect for what they are made for. They give you a level of protection from the cold and look very sharp when worn with business attire.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Dvorochkin

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The 4th or 5th time I pulled them on the leather ripped on the palm side of the wrist all the way across. I repaired with tape and staples. Have now worn maybe 30 times and the index finger has ripped 3 directions at the finger pad. Paper thin leather. Gloves are sized properly (not too small). Have only used for driving, not work.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: To begin with, the appearance is very presentable. I really liked the quality of the materials - the entire surface is uniform without the slightest defect. Smooth seams. The material inside is warm enough to -10 centigrade. On hand gloves sit right - not too tight and at the same time without too much slack, which eliminates the ingress of cold air inside. The material is very malleable. In gloves, I can freely perform actions that require precise tactile sensations — for example, buttoning up buttons or pressing some buttons. Contrast trim around the edges and the emblem was also in place. Not too striking the eye and at the same time creating an element of perfection of design.
customer_reviews.author: Namarkil

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I am updating the review since I am impressed by the customer service. We were contacted and offered a new pair of gloves after noting in my original review that the original pair of gloves worked ok from Jan 2016 until spring but then no longer worked when the weather got cold again a few weeks ago. The replacement pair arrived promptly, look good, and work well.
customer_reviews.author: Carson W. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Much too small
customer_reviews.text: I do not know how they "size" these gloves, but they are extremely small. I normally use large gloves and these do not fit. Not even close. Not simply tight, but unable to put on. Maybe XXL = standard large. I verified with the other gloves I have at my house that I wear large.
customer_reviews.author: red-beard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: I have cold hands year-round. So, I need something warm, comfortable, able to work on my iPhone and other touch surfaces. These work terrific for any use! As far as sizing goes, I am right on the border between medium and large. This time I went with medium, which initially was tight. However, after breaking them in they fit tightly, but comfortably. The lining is comfortable but not too thick. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: James M. Greer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, STUNNING CUSTOMER SERVICE!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased these not realizing they were brown, I wanted black gloves. So, I let Marino know the product was great, but I thought they were going to be black. Instead of just apologizing, Marino sent a pair of black gloves. WOW!!! Who knew that kind of customer service still existed! I'll be back around Christmas to get gloves for the family! Product is GREAT, and these folks are FOR REAL! Thanks Marino!
customer_reviews.author: Marshal Connell

customer_reviews.title: Runs a size small.
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice gloves. The stitching is great, the leather looks very good and the coloring is perfectly even. The fleece lining is very nice and soft. Very high quality, and excellent construction. But as others have mentioned, they definitely run small. Consider ordering a size larger than you ordinarily would, unless you prefer a tight fit. I like the gloves enough that I'm ordering a second pair, one size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Gloves are very soft and comfortable. Very dressy. I bought the zippered version. Lining is thin so gloves handle the average cold weather, but not suited for temps in single digits. For the price they are worth the price. Following the size chart was a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Lakedog

customer_reviews.title: fits snug
customer_reviews.text: The gloves were nice quality , the seller was very accommodating, i ordered a small for my BF he is tall and thin, had to return them , ordered the medium, had to return them , too small, just reordered the large, hoping they fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tinkerbell

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves! Soft and supple (I just like that word, supple. See how I used the word supple three times?)
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. They feel great outside and inside. Love the softness inside! Con: not as warm as I would have thought, but nice enough not to care that much. Touchscreen part works fine.
customer_reviews.author: JFM

customer_reviews.title: I put I don't like them because I did not receive the item pictured
customer_reviews.text: I put I don't like them because I did not receive the item pictured. Therefore, I did not receive the item I ordered. The gloves are good quality and had I got the gloves I ordered they probably would have been worth the money. I received no response from this review in view of the fact that I did not get what I ordered. I'm afraid to re-order for fear I may get the same wrong item again.
customer_reviews.author: JSW

customer_reviews.title: Skip these
customer_reviews.text: These gloves have very soft leather and lining. However, they are very undersized and tight. Go a full size larger than you would normally get. I can't use these because they are so small and make my hands colder.
customer_reviews.author: Roosterman

customer_reviews.title: Order these Two Sizes Larger
customer_reviews.text: I saw on the page how to measure my hand and did so. Then I ordered one size larger and when I received them I couldn't even get the gloves past my knuckles. Even at $30 I am not going to take the time to return them rather I will buy them from a "Brick and Mortar" store in my area. VERY DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: fdunn

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are exquisite!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the most beautiful gloves I've seen at any price. They could easily have been sold at a high-end store for $120.00, and been well worth it. The craftsmanship is impeccable, and the leather fits like a soft second skin. I'm so pleased with my selection, and would not hesitate to give my strongest recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Allen K.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The seam started to split after wearing about 7 times. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SaraF.

customer_reviews.title: The gloves are comfortable, if they actually fit
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine, but I have to give three stars for the sizing. I ordered XL, but when they arrived there was no way they could possibly fit me, and I do not have "large hands". However they fit my teenage son, so he's happy with them. If the product can actually be produced in sizes that fit adults, I'll revise my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very decent for the price and good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the price ($30, free shipping). I foresee these gloves will serve me for many years. Not a work glove by any means, but suitable for light use such as driving or out and about. Customer service was excellent and send out the correct color quickly when a mistake was made.
customer_reviews.author: watermonkey

customer_reviews.title: Great Leather Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Very soft leather and the touch sensitivity in the fingers are great to operate your smartphone. However they do run a little small to order the next size up when ordering. Great Gloves!!!
customer_reviews.author: Coach205

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Gloves!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves as a gift for my husband. He didn't have very thick gloves and since it was starting to get cold again, I decided to look for nice leather gloves. This was the best option I came across. Very affordable, and the quality is great! The gloves also work very well on touchscreen phones. I got a small for him, because he mentioned his last pair of gloves also being size small. He said its a bit tight, but over time, I'm sure he'll break into them since leather stretches out. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Torralba

customer_reviews.title: Gloves run small.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves were a Christmas present and unfortunately they are too small. He always wears a medium so I felt confident they would be fine. They appear to be very nice gloves but you should let people know they run small. Now I have $30 gloves one in my family can wear. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: SIZING IS WRONG
customer_reviews.text: great gloves. Touch screen works on a couple of fingers not all of them. Only real complaint is on sizing. Used their chart, ordered XL. They could be forced on, but were to tight to be comfortable as very tight when gripping or making a fist. Ordered XXL and sent XL back. XXL were smaller than XL. Could not get my hand into them. Would be a great product if the size was accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Roger S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these gloves as a gift for my guy but have not given them to him as yet. Upon examination, the gloves look to be very well made. I put my hands in them and the fur although it says faux, feels like the real thing. also loved the packaging. Looks like quality! I think he will like them.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Fountain

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Gloves but Size Up
customer_reviews.text: Just received. The leather and stitching appear fine and high quality. My hands measure approximately 8.25" at knuckles which usually means men's M. I saw a few reviews suggesting they run small. I ordered the L and they fit great. Do order up one.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: The Best Gloves I Have Ever Bought!
customer_reviews.text: I bought them way ahead of time as a Christmas present so it took a couple months to be able to review but these gloves were wonderful and the delivery was excellent. The reviews do warn that they are a tight fitting glove and they do run a bit small so I ordered an extra large instead of the usual large and they were a huge hit! They are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: A. Converse

customer_reviews.title: My husband usually wears a size medium.  He does not have large hands but these are too tight.
customer_reviews.text: We like the leather. It is beautiful & the lining is nice. They would be very comfortable if they were a little larger. We are worried about the medium not stretching enough & are concerned that if we return for the large that they will be too big.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Very nice "fashion" gloves that look nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice "fashion" gloves that look nice, fit and feel good, but as many others said the sizes seem to run a little small. I wish they made a XXXL for us guys with long fingers, but these XXL are fine and I will keep them forever also they really go overboard on the packaging , nice box with a ribbon and gloves inside are wrapped in paper so they would really made a nice gift. Thanks Richard Scarbrough Real Estate Broker Memphis TN
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handsome Gloves- Very Small Fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought XL for my hubby. The gloves are well made and beautiful- but they run VERY small, even for driving gloves. I ordered XXL and they were too small for my hubby. Letting our 2 sons try them on before returning. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Foo99

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, fancy and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, fancy and good quality. It comes in a nice package, you can give as a gift. Also, the customer service is very helpful. I ordered a medium pair but it was small for me, so they helped me immediately after I contacted them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gloves
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are tough, comfortable, and well made. They fit (size medium) nicely and warm, even during freezing condition. The gloves has good grip on steering wheel and most non-slippery items. I keep them in my car all the time.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Very sleek—order a size up
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant, and flexible enough to function without removing them. My hands are medium at most, and the Large size fits close, so do order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Crowder

customer_reviews.title: The leather is very nice, but the gloves are thin and my fingers ...
customer_reviews.text: The leather is very nice, but the gloves are thin and my fingers were numb after just a 15 minute drive to work in 20 F degree weather - definitely not winter gloves as described. Also, as other reviewers have noted, the thumbs are about 1/2-3/4" too long making them look and feel odd. The other fingers fit well though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Gloves, Great Seller
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are beautiful and the leather is quite supple. You might need to order a size larger than usual. The seller responds promptly with concern for customer satisfaction. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DBG

customer_reviews.title: Better than pictured
customer_reviews.text: These gloves were purchased as a gift. Knowing that the person receiving the gloves (my son) was rather picky I knew I was rolling the dice. Surprisingly, he loved them and wears them daily during this Indiana winter.
customer_reviews.author: K. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: high quality glove
customer_reviews.text: It's a shame I couldn't use these gloves. Very good quality. They were just too small. According to the size guide I required a 2xl, but the 2xl gloves I received were too small. If other sizes follow suite, I would recommend buying a size larger.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: The hand insert in the gloves is a great back scratcher!
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!! These are great, warm and the wrist has elastic. I am going to buy a second pair since I am carless. Maybe I should invest in lost glove insurance, Oh, I kept the box and the card board hands that came inside the gloves are a good back scratcher. Recommend!m
customer_reviews.author: Kent H. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: The size runs small, but beautiful gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, high quality gloves. The fit was too small even though I measured my hand and ordered the appropriate size. I have ordered another pair in a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Hamilton Cheifetz

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son and he loves them! Some people complained about the brown edging, but it looks amazing! They’re very nice.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Nice look Warm Touchscreen compatibility is very good Cons: Runs VERY small. I got a medium and had to return them. The large I replaced them with are STILL too tight. Thumbs are too long!! Makes using a phone inconvenient which was the whole point.
customer_reviews.author: Person of Interest

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gloves with fine workmanship and cozy fit. I was surprised at how comfortable they were. Can confirm that they are touch screen compatible. Warm enough for a Chicago winter.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove. (if you get them one size larger)
customer_reviews.text: Very thin leather and very thin lining. I doubt that they will be very warm. Decent looking and fit snugly and I bought one size larger than normal. Smell pretty bad so I haven't worn them outside yet. Will re-post when I do. If I had it to do over again I try the Classic Design.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. L

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves on a budget!
customer_reviews.text: These are honestly awesome! The touch functionality works great and they keep you fairly warm for being so thin. I wouldn't take them in the tundra nor the rain forest (although they seemed pretty water proof in drizzles), but they are a great option for walking around the city!
customer_reviews.author: David E

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit at first, but breaking in nicely.  Buy a size large.
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews here, I bought a size large. That was the right move, as they were quite tight at first. After wearing them for a little over a week, they are starting to feel more comfortable. The only minor nitpick that I have with them is that the tip of the index finger feels a bit bunchy where the seams come together. That's not unique to these gloves, but a broader problem that some ingenious handwear design engineer should look into solving.
customer_reviews.author: Rylan Grant

customer_reviews.title: Nice style
customer_reviews.text: I find these to have a nice fit and feel to them. The construction appears to be very well done. I don't wear them often, so can't say anything about durability yet. I think they make a good addition to your wardrobe however.
customer_reviews.author: S. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Husband wears them!!
customer_reviews.text: My Paws-for-hands Husband has worn them driving, riding, feeding horses, and deep sea fishing all since Christmas. He has not tested the screen technology yet but they fit his paws and keep them warm. He even likes the style. This is the first pair of gloves he has worn that I have bought and that includes all the usual farm work gloves.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small, not true to size
customer_reviews.text: My dad usually wears a large in clothes, but with these the XXL barely fit him. Had to order 3 times to get the right size. Great gloves tho!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice high quality gloves, but seem to run a bit small.
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my son. Had to return the L and reorder XL, which fit fine, so in our experience they seem to run a bit small. He is highly allergic to wool, so the fact that the lining has NO wool content was important for him.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia J Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, well made gloves.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are very, very nice. Well made and attractive, they look sleek and dressy but are also warm and easy to wear. Elasticized wrists snug them on my hands. Excellent vendor, fast delivery, packaging protective of the product. Recommend them first rate.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: That's close you'll ever find
customer_reviews.text: These are the best gloves I've ever seen in one of the greatest prices I've ever come across buy as many as you can this is like blue chip on the stock market
customer_reviews.author: Warren T

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful man gloves, nice look with the zipper, makes it a little different from the regular gloves. Soft leather with warm lining, great fit. Very nice!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Too cold!
customer_reviews.text: They are stylish, but not warm at all. I can almost say they absorb the cold instead of keeping hands warm!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: terrible fit
customer_reviews.text: These gloves ran very small for being an XL Men's. I ended up wearing them and buying my husband a different pair from another company. VERY Disappointed in your product.
customer_reviews.author: nancy johnson

customer_reviews.title: Touchscreen functionality on all fingers.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these as a gift. He really liked the gloves especially that the xl was actually big enough for his hands. The touch screen functionality worked on all fingers really well. They do not have different fabric on the tips that is noticable.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Kipke

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: These were bought as a gift for my boyfriend as he has been wanting nice leather gloves for awhile now. It’s been about a month and he tells me how much he loves his gloves at least twice a week. They keep his hands warm in our cold UT weather and they look so good on him! Definitely recommend for men who want to add something manly/distinguishing to their winter wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Good looking dress gloves
customer_reviews.text: Love the ability to use touch screen on my phone! Very well made - fit a bit snug so size appropriately
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Ringdahl

customer_reviews.title: these gloves look and feel great!
customer_reviews.text: these gloves look and feel great! very good quality. they look great with dress clothes or casual. i highly recommend these for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Zimmer

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the nappa leather gloves for my son as a gift. They are well made, soft rich looking leather, nice warm lining and are very atttactive especially with the zipper. Delivery was quick and vendor has been very attentive to make sure everything was satisfactory. I'm pleased with my purchase and would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Nita T.

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, comfortable gloves. All fingers work with touchscreen. I bought the black zip model, wrist could be tighter but I have small wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Quality pair of men’s gloves
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to find a size small in men’s gloves and these fit perfectly. These are high quality gloves and very nice looking. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Moffa

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking gloves. Order 1 size larger than what you usually wear.
customer_reviews.text: Gloves look nice, but they were tight. Order 1 size larger than you’re used to wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Busy B

customer_reviews.title: The touchscreen ability is awesome
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved the touchscreen ability. He thought they were a little tight fitting but kept his hands warm while in Chicago. Thamks...
customer_reviews.author: sherelia felder

customer_reviews.title: ORDER ONE SIZE UP!!
customer_reviews.text: My hands are size 8 which is Small, Bought Medium instead and they fit perfectly. Very stylish and leather is super soft. Excellent buy!~~
customer_reviews.author: Xingyu Tan

customer_reviews.title: Cool. A little snug and the lining has a ...
customer_reviews.text: Cool. A little snug and the lining has a foul odor at first but they keep hands warm and you can still work the phone.
customer_reviews.author: ALP

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: I like these gloves they keep me warm and are comfortable to wear. Disclaimer, if you live where's there's a real winter, these wouldn't be effective. I live in Houston.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Winfree

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great classy looking gloves. Good quality leather and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small!
customer_reviews.text: Not good... VERY small no matter the size you buy
customer_reviews.author: D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: While the gloves appeared to be very nice upon arrival, the stitching in the thumb and the zippers fell apart after one month. I wore them to keep my hands warm while driving, and did not use them for any hard work. They shouldn't have fallen apart with such lightweight use.
customer_reviews.author: Art Frazee

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY !!!
customer_reviews.text: I never left a bad review. This is my first. Do not buy these !!! I ordered XxL. But they are tiny. I double checked the order and size, and it all said XXL. I have them to my 12 year old niece, they are two small for her. So unless you have a pre schooler with average size hands for their age, do not buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Kotsonis

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY and WARM
customer_reviews.text: LOVE them!!! I’m female and bought because I needed and wanted a little longer fingers. PERFECT! Quality is superb!
customer_reviews.author: topslisa

customer_reviews.title: Loved it but fell apart in two days
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, looks great! Smells great! But the stitching came undone in 48 hours of use so about 2 hours. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: these gloves are great, they fit nicely and I can do anything in them, good looking too
customer_reviews.author: Jc DH

customer_reviews.title: Dad loves them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 84 year old father for Christmas. I don't have the "wearing details" but he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: KathyF

customer_reviews.title: Bad Sizing
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are nice and seem to be well made but apparently run small. I ordered extra large and barely got my hand into them. Much closer to a medium. Had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Katsmama

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Perfect gloves that actually fit and don’t fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good luck with sizes.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered large and the pair received was not labeled. I could not get even my fingers in them!
customer_reviews.author: J Morse

customer_reviews.title: Nice leather, hole in lining, Seller sent me a new pair for free.
customer_reviews.text: Gloves came with a hole in the insulation about a half inch in diameter. Otherwise satisfactory. Update: Upon reading my review, seller sent me a new pair of gloves free of charge. No complaints, so five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Peter G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are a very high-quality and are a fantastic value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AMZN$Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: The leather is very smooth, the box and the presentation is beautiful very good product
customer_reviews.author: SON'S OF BEACHES

customer_reviews.title: He said they are very comfortable and feel good when he wears them
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very impressed with these gloves. He said they are very comfortable and feel good when he wears them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leather Gloves -
customer_reviews.text: Medium size was a bit snug, but should stretch in time
customer_reviews.author: Janice Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Puts the love in gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are crafted with love. They are so much warmer than any winter gloves I've found on the market, and far more waterproof as well. I will be buying these again!
customer_reviews.author: Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are most attractive and well made - the leather/lining have a luxuriant feel to them - highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur S. Huber

customer_reviews.title: Takes a Little Bit to Break In
customer_reviews.text: I was going to complain about how these gloves were just a little too small, but after about an hour of wearing them they feel just fine. Feel good, look good, they're a pair of gloves, what more can I say?
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves even better Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my father, genuine leather with smooth faux fur inner lining. Just as the description says they fit snug so make sure you order a size up. The customer service is excellent with swift responses & immediate exchanes, it really shows they aim to satisfy the customer.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. Best pair of gloves I've ever had. Especially for being leather with touch screen capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy yourself a big size.
customer_reviews.text: The package is well packed. Both the inside and the outside are carefully packed together and are suitable for protecting the product and the gift. Leather material is thin, and touch operates smoothly. As recommended by Seller, the actual size of the gloves is smaller than the size shown. Therefore, you must order one more size than one. However, the inner lining was slightly less than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Park, Chan-beom

customer_reviews.title: Run Small
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice gloves and I really wanted them for my sons Christmas, however, I ordered the XXL and they are very small ( They fit my 5'2" mother nicely but where just a little long in the fingers. There was no way these would fit my son. Sadly I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: katy

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, affordable, and CRAZY comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love the gloves. Very high quality and comfortable. They also look very stylish and go with a lot of my clothes. Them came in a great box that I use as a carrying case. The best part is they are lined with a very soft material that makes me look forward to putting them on.
customer_reviews.author: WadeHarms

customer_reviews.title: Nice one
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good fit. No more removing gloves to use touchscreen.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: They are great. I had to return as I received 2 left handed gloves !! Haha
customer_reviews.author: Lee Hoch

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are great soft and warm I highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: manny moreira

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and very high quality
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are very well made and the fit is perfect. I am very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Nirup Nakka

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and feel
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size small. Thought about purchasing a medium, took a shot at the small, and was glad I did. They fit "Like a glove" pun intended. Classy look and feel. Would recommend to anyone looking for the PERFECT GLOVE!!
customer_reviews.author: Roger K

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color (no big deal)
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and warm. The leather is nice and soft And fits snug.I knocked off one star because I ordered chocolate brown and received black.Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Luxury Mens Real Sheepskin Leather Gloves for Winter and Cold Weather - Touch Screen  - Driving - Insulated - Waterproof
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :10.6 x 4.6 x 0.08 inches; 7.2 Ounces
 * Item model number :TM055-3-BK-L
 * Department :Mens

 * ASIN :B075CTX4QC

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #496,763 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #363 inMen's Cold Weather Gloves 
    *  #158816 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.2 out of 5 stars415 ratings
feature_bullets: Quality Craftsmanship - The Marino leather gloves are made of high-quality nappa leather exterior and a faux fur interior. It offers luxurious softness combined with awesome durability for long-lasting enjoyment. The gloves are waterproof and performed well in frigid, snowy and windy conditions.
Exclusive Design -. Versatile and ideal for driving, outdoor sports, and cold weather travel. The Mio Marino gloves for men is touch screen sensitive, to keep your hands toasty at all times.

SUPERIOR FIT- Marino’s Leather gloves offer a genuinely snug fit - so, make sure to ORDER A SIZE UP! The rubber wrist and non-slip palm detail contribute to that awesome snug and neat feel on hands and fingers.

Fashion Forward - Enjoy accessorizing, your way, with the Mio Marino genuine leather gloves which come in 3 different styles. Its dressy and fashion-forward design will complement your wardrobe seamlessly.

100% Purchasing Satisfaction Guaranteed - As our valued customer at Mio Marino, we look forward to offering you the best services throughout your purchase. You can easily benefit from our free returns and replacements on all purchases no questions asked!
